com.mygdx.game

Class Save

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.Save

  • public class Save
extends java.lang.Object
    The Save class acts as a data class that temporarily stores the user's data, such as their username, the difficulty and level they are currently on, as well as the time they currently have (in seconds). The class contains various getters and setters that allow for the easy manipulation of data.
    Version:
    4.0 07.06.2016
    Author:
    David Le

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int currentDifficulty 
      private java.lang.String name 
      private int timeSeconds 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Save(java.lang.String newName, int newDifficulty, int newTimeSeconds)
      The Save constructor is used to take in the username, the current stage, and the time the user has as parameters, and store them in the class through variables.
